docs.summary: API for the site's txt files (robots.txt and ads.txt)

permissions.name: Manage Ads.txt
permissions.description: Request permission to read and manage the site's ads.txt file.

params.name: adsTxt
params.doc:
Submitted `content` object will be appended to the existing Ads.txt file.
To reset Ads.txt to Wix's default, submit `default:true` without a `content` object.

docs.summary:
Appends the submitted `content` object to Ads.txt.
 In order to reset Ads.txt to Wix's default, send `default: true` without a `content` object.

examples.title: Append Ads.txt Example
body:
curl PATCH https://www.wixapis.com/promote-seo-txt-file-server/v2/ads \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -d '{"adsTxt": {"content": "google.com, pub-0000000000000001, DIRECT, f08c47fec0942fa0", "subdomain": "www"}}'

permissions.name: Manage Ads.txt
permissions.description: Request permission to read and manage the site's ads.txt file.

params.name: subdomain
params.doc: Subdomain of Ads.txt, for example `www`, `es`, `fr`. Default is `www`.

ret.doc: The response of the Ads.txt file request

permissions.name: Manage Ads.txt
permissions.description: Request permission to read and manage the site's ads.txt file.

params.name: adsTxt
params.doc:
Submitted `adsTxT` object will replace the existing Ads.txt file.
To reset Ads.txt to Wix's default, submit `default:true` without a `content` object.

docs.summary:
Updates the Ads.txt file.
 When setting the `content` object to an empty string, an empty Ads.txt file will be created.
 In order to reset Ads.txt to Wix's default, send `default: true` without a `content` object.

examples.title: Update Ads.txt Example
body:
curl PUT https://www.wixapis.com/promote-seo-txt-file-server/v2/ads \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -d '{"adsTxt": {"content": "google.com, pub-0000000000000000, DIRECT, f08c47fec0942fa0", "subdomain": "www"}}'

extra.description: You can pass `default: true` in case you need to reset to default

messages.name: _com_wixpress_promote_seo_robots_server_v2_AdsTxtUpdatedDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Ads Txt Updated Domain Event Object

members.name: entityId
members.doc: AdsTxt ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

messages.name: _com_wixpress_promote_seo_robots_server_v2_AdsTxtEntityUpdatedEvent
messages.displayName: Ads Txt Entity Updated Event Object

messages.name: _com_wixpress_promote_seo_robots_server_v2_RobotsTxtUpdatedDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Robots Txt Updated Domain Event Object

members.name: entityId
members.doc: RobotsTxt ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

messages.name: _com_wixpress_promote_seo_robots_server_v2_RobotsTxtEntityUpdatedEvent
messages.displayName: Robots Txt Entity Updated Event Object

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: previousEntityAsJson
members.doc: Previous event body, as a stringified JSON (when relevant).

members.name: default
members.doc: The Wix default robots.txt file content

members.name: subdomain
members.doc: The subdomain of the requested robots.txt file ,e.g. www, es, fr. default is www.

docs.summary: The request to get the Robots.txt file content

members.name: subdomain
members.doc: The subdomain of the requested robots.txt file ,e.g. www, es, fr. default is www.

docs.summary: The response of the Robots.txt file request
The request to update the content of the Robots.txt file

members.name: robotsTxt
members.doc:
Provided content will override existing content.
Use `default:true` to reset the content to default, no `content` is required in that case

members.name: default
members.doc: Whether current Ads.txt is Wix's default.

members.name: subdomain
members.doc: Subdomain of Ads.txt, for example `www`, `es`, `fr`. Default is `www`.

docs.summary: The request to get the Ads.txt file content

members.name: subdomain
members.doc: Subdomain of Ads.txt, for example `www`, `es`, `fr`. Default is `www`.

docs.summary: The response of the Ads.txt file request
The request to update the content of the Ads.txt file

members.name: adsTxt
members.doc:
Submitted `adsTxT` object will replace the existing Ads.txt file.
To reset Ads.txt to Wix's default, submit `default:true` without a `content` object.

docs.summary: The request to append the content of the Ads.txt file

members.name: adsTxt
members.doc:
Submitted `content` object will be appended to the existing Ads.txt file.
To reset Ads.txt to Wix's default, submit `default:true` without a `content` object.
